items.name: Nanyuki Bricktopia Grand
items.short_description: An expansive indoor world dedicated to LEGO, featuring massive building zones, interactive displays, and themed construction challenges for all ages.
items.address: Off Nanyuki-Meru Road, Next to Cedar Mall, Nanyuki

items.name: Safari Builder's Hub
items.short_description: A unique construction park where children use large, safari-themed blocks to build animal enclosures, vehicles, and their own savanna adventures.
items.address: Nanyuki Airstrip Road, Near Ol Pejeta Gate, Nanyuki

items.name: Mount Kenya Block Works
items.short_description: Inspired by Mount Kenya, this park challenges kids to build towering structures, intricate bridges, and miniature ecosystems using diverse building materials.
items.address: Kenyatta Highway, Nanyuki Town Centre, Nanyuki

items.name: Riverland LEGO Lab
items.short_description: An interactive lab focusing on water dynamics and construction, where children design and build dams, aqueducts, and floating structures with LEGO bricks.
items.address: Off Nanyuki-Nyeri Road, Near River Nanyuki, Nanyuki

items.name: Jurassic Nanyuki Adventure
items.short_description: Step back in time to a land ruled by dinosaurs! Encounter life-sized animatronic dinosaurs, explore ancient forests, and discover fossils.

items.name: Raptor Ridge Discovery
items.short_description: Focusing on agile predators, this park offers a thrilling journey through raptor habitats, complete with excavation sites and a 'Dino-Dig' sandbox.

items.name: Herbivore Haven Trails
items.short_description: A peaceful walking trail where visitors can observe gentle giant herbivores like Brontosaurus and Triceratops in their natural, prehistoric settings.
items.address: Near Fairmont Mt. Kenya Safari Club, Nanyuki

items.name: Dino Roar Safari
items.short_description: Embark on an interactive vehicle safari through a rugged landscape, encountering roaring, moving dinosaurs and learning about their ancient lives.

items.name: Nanyuki Discovery Dome
items.short_description: An interactive science center featuring a planetarium, hands-on exhibits covering physics, biology, and chemistry, designed to spark curiosity in young minds.
items.address: Kenyatta Highway, Nanyuki Town Centre, Nanyuki

items.name: Kinetic Kids Lab
items.short_description: Explore the principles of motion, energy, and forces through engaging experiments and build-it-yourself stations, perfect for budding engineers.
items.address: Off Nanyuki-Meru Road, Near Braeburn Nanyuki, Nanyuki

items.name: Wild Wonders Science Center
items.short_description: Dive into the biodiversity of Kenya with exhibits on local wildlife, ecosystems, and conservation, including a mini-zoo and botanical garden.

items.name: Star Gazer's Observatory & Lab
items.short_description: An astronomical center where children can learn about stars, planets, and galaxies through powerful telescopes, interactive space models, and virtual reality experiences.

items.name: Ol Pejeta Adventureland
items.short_description: An exciting outdoor adventure park featuring ziplines, rope courses, climbing walls, and multi-level play structures, all set against a safari backdrop.
items.address: Adjacent to Ol Pejeta Conservancy, Nanyuki

items.name: Forest Canopy Climbs
items.short_description: A unique playground experience designed within a natural forest, offering treehouse-style platforms, suspended bridges, and gentle climbing challenges.
items.address: Off Nanyuki-Nyeri Road, Near Ngare Ndare Forest, Nanyuki

items.name: Safari Springs Playground
items.short_description: An animal-themed playground with innovative splash pads, water cannons, and interactive play structures perfect for cooling down on a sunny Nanyuki day.
items.address: Kenyatta Highway, Nanyuki Town Centre, Nanyuki

items.name: Nanyuki Explorer's Park
items.short_description: An ultimate challenge for young adventurers with extensive obstacle courses, a low ropes course, and a dedicated area for competitive games and challenges.

items.name: Toon Town Nanyuki
items.short_description: A vibrant hub where children can meet and interact with their favorite cartoon characters, participate in sing-alongs, and capture memorable photos.

items.name: African Tales Corner
items.short_description: Discover local folk heroes and beloved characters from African animated stories. Enjoy storytelling sessions and unique cultural interactions.

items.name: Princess & Hero Hall
items.short_description: A magical place where dreams come true! Meet enchanting princesses, brave superheroes, and participate in royal parades and heroic training academies.

items.name: Safari Friends Stage
items.short_description: Join a cast of lively animal cartoon characters for interactive shows, dance parties, and personal meet & greet opportunities on a specially designed stage.

items.name: Aqua Safari Nanyuki
items.short_description: A thrilling water park with multiple slides, a lazy river, and a large splash pad, all themed around the exciting wildlife of the savanna.

items.name: River Rapids Splash Zone
items.short_description: Experience the thrill of rapids with winding slides, a wave pool, and interactive water features designed to mimic a flowing river system.

items.name: Little Lagoon Leaks
items.short_description: A dedicated, shallow water play area for toddlers and young children, featuring gentle sprays, mini-slides, and interactive water tables in a safe environment.
items.address: Kenyatta Highway, Nanyuki Town Centre, Nanyuki

items.name: Mountain Mist Water Fun
items.short_description: A cool water park experience themed after Mount Kenya's misty peaks, offering unique splash features, geysers, and water playgrounds with stunning views.
items.address: Near the base of Mount Kenya, Nanyuki

items.name: Enchanted Savannah Magic
items.short_description: Witness incredible feats of magic and illusion in a show that blends African storytelling with captivating tricks, perfect for the whole family.

items.name: The Great Nanyuki Illusionist
items.short_description: A spectacular grand illusion show featuring disappearing acts, levitation, and mind-bending tricks that will leave children and adults spellbound.

items.name: Safari Sorcery Tent
items.short_description: An intimate, interactive magic show where kids can get up close to the magician, learn simple tricks, and participate in magical experiments.

items.name: Mystical Mount Kenya Miracles
items.short_description: A unique magic show inspired by the legends and landscapes of Mount Kenya, featuring themed illusions and audience participation.
items.address: Fairmont Mount Kenya Safari Club, Nanyuki

items.name: Lost Treasure of Mount Kenya
items.short_description: An outdoor scavenger hunt and quest game where teams follow clues, solve puzzles, and overcome challenges to find a legendary 'treasure' of Nanyuki.
items.address: Near the Base of Mount Kenya, Nanyuki

items.name: Safari Code Breakers
items.short_description: An escape room style game set in an immersive safari theme. Kids work together to solve riddles and decode clues to 'escape' before time runs out.

items.name: The Secret of Ol Pejeta
items.short_description: An interactive outdoor quest game designed to educate children about wildlife conservation and the importance of protecting endangered species at Ol Pejeta.
items.address: Adjacent to Ol Pejeta Conservancy, Nanyuki

items.name: Nanyuki Eco-Quest
items.short_description: A nature-based adventure where kids complete a series of ecological challenges and puzzles, learning about local flora and fauna while exploring a simulated wilderness.

items.name: Nanyuki Wildlife Haven
items.short_description: A small, ethical zoo dedicated to local and rescued Kenyan wildlife, offering educational programs and close-up viewing opportunities.

items.name: Gentle Giants Petting Farm
items.short_description: A charming petting zoo focused on friendly farm animals, allowing children to feed and interact with goats, lambs, ponies, and more in a safe environment.

items.name: Feathered Friends Aviary
items.short_description: An immersive aviary experience showcasing a vibrant collection of indigenous and exotic birds. Walk through and observe birds in a natural habitat.

items.name: Reptile Rendezvous
items.short_description: A fascinating exhibit dedicated to reptiles and amphibians, offering educational displays and supervised encounters with snakes, lizards, and turtles.
items.address: Kenyatta Highway, Nanyuki Town Centre, Nanyuki

items.name: Nanyuki Safari Land
items.short_description: A vibrant safari-themed amusement park with gentle rides, interactive games, and live shows featuring costumed animal characters.

items.name: Mount Kenya Heights Park
items.short_description: Inspired by the majestic mountain, this park offers adventure rides, a miniature railway, and themed attractions showcasing local culture and landscapes.
items.address: Near the Base of Mount Kenya, Nanyuki

items.name: Riverland Fun Fair
items.short_description: A lively theme park centered around water-based attractions, including splash rides, boat adventures, and carnival games with a riverside vibe.

items.name: Wildlife Wanderland Park
items.short_description: An educational theme park where children learn about global wildlife through immersive exhibits, discovery trails, and interactive animal encounters, without real animals.
